'''Evil Banisher''' is a part of the [[Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls]] event.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Evil Banisher 1.png
|text1    = In "Evil Banisher" challenges, completing all Banishing Rite objectives will award you with Banishing Aura, dealing AoE DMG to opponents.
|image2   = Tutorial Iktomi Spiritseeking Scrolls Evil Banisher 2.png
|text2    = While Banishing Aura is active, you will not be able to accumulate progress toward Banishing Rites. Once the blessing expires, you can continue completing objectives and once again obtain Banishing Aura.
}}

==Stages==
{{Description|The search for Spirits seems to have attracted many uninvited guests. For safety's sake, perhaps it's better to get rid of these villains as soon as possible...|Map Marker Description}}

===Tempest of the Night Realm===
{{Description|Deep from within the Night Realm, a howling storm answers when summoned. In accordance with the pact by which it is bound, it will assist in the banishment of evil intruders.}}
Unlocks 2024-11-28 10{{Colon}}00

;Monster List
{{Card List|delim=;|type=Enemy|show_caption=1|Ruin Guard; Anemo Hilichurl Rogue; Koholasaurus; Tepetlisaurus; Yumkasaurus; Flowing Blade Skirmisher; Swiftstep Armed Courier; Forged Sand Shieldbreaker; Construction Specialist Mek - Pneuma}}

;Banishing Rite
During the challenge, complete all objectives in the Banishing Rite to obtain the Banishing Aura for 15s.
* Trigger 5 {{Color|menu|Swirl}} reactions on opponents with your active character
* Trigger a {{Color|menu|Nightsoul Burst}} 1 time(s)

;Banishing Aura
A "Spiritsoul Purge" centered around your active character that deals AoE DMG will be unleashed. This can occur once every 1.5s.
